citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:30 pm to
5:15 pm on 05-AUG-19.
During that time, the inspector waited at the facility and called all available phone numbers on file leaving a
massage at each number.
